DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Have a good day!

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: You too mom.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Another day, another six periods of school. Finally a day without any tests or projects.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: I'm headed to the cafeteria so I can get a cookie before class. Wanna join me?

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Good morning [main]!

DialogueOption.Text: "I wonder how many para-Lyannas found me this quickly."

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Lyanna pulls out a prism on her way towards the school cafeteria.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: *giggles* Probably in like all of them. I was waiting for you to show up, you know.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: From around the corner, my friend Lyanna walks up to greet me.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Ever since Chiang invented the prism, people can’t seem to get enough of messaging their paraselves.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Glancing around, you see at least 7 other students with prisms.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Wanna hear a joke?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Sure.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: The school’s attempt to ban prisms.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: That happened?

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: At the start of the semester, the school made a big deal about banning prism use during school hours.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: They mentioned something about mental health impacts and whatever.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: It's all a bunch of propaganda to try and prevent people from spreading test answers across parallel worlds though.

DialogueOption.Text: "It's not a good joke if you have to explain it."

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: heh heh heh

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: *Laughs* Your fake laugh is terrible

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Aw, well you didn’t have to say it to my face like that

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: From the corner of my vision, I see Kris, the school president, frantically doing her homework while scarfing a bagel.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I didn’t know it was possible to eat that quickly, let alone do homework at the same time.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Is Kris doing homework fifteen minutes before class starts? I guess I shouldn’t be one to judge.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: You’re pretty diligent about this sort of stuff, aren’t you, [main]. I’ve never even seen you do homework at school.

DialogueOption.Text: "I don’t have any extracurriculars, so I have a lot of time."

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Ohhhhhh, that makes sense.

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Did you know Kris is in every extracurricular I’m in? She’s so cool!

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Of course it’s a compliment, dummy!

DialogueNode.Name: Lyanna
DialogueNode.Text: Where did that phrase even come from? Anyways…

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I chat with Lyanna for a little while longer.
